{{restart-server-to-see-changes}}: Restart the server to see the changes
{{change-only-sp}}: Server name only changes in the server.properties 'motd'
{{signin-msg-login}}: Sign in to use this application
{{rate-limit-login}}: Too many requests, try again in 5 seconds
{{access-blocked-section}}: You do not have access to this section
{{kubek-sett-warn-ks}}:
Access to the Kubek settings section and account editing (including editing the administrator account) will be fully allowed.

Allow with caution!
{{logout-all-ks}}: Sign out of your account on all devices
{{allowintacc-ks}}: Allow access from other IPs (needs a restart to work properly)
{{users-limited-count-ks}}: Unable to create user, maximum number of users is 5
{{tgbot-ks}}: Telegram bot is used to manage servers, and will also notify you of important events happening with servers and Kubek
{{passwd-err-ks}}: Password must be between 6 and 64 characters long (must be numbers, uppercase and letters)
{{tgbot-otp-ks}}: Telegram Bot One Time Password (updates every 15 seconds) (write /start [this code])
{{fullres-need-ks}}: Disabling FTPD requires a full restart of Kubek
{{resonerr-ss}}: Restart server on crash (checked by exit code)
{{enter-to-del-ss}}: Enter the server name to confirm the deletion
{{stopcmd-ss}}: You can enter a custom shutdown command here
{{resschd-desc-ss}}: Restart the server on schedule (enter the task below <a href='http://www.crontabgenerator.com/'>in crontab format<a/>)
{{welcome-msg}}: Kubek is a Minecraft server control panel developed using Node.js and web technologies.
{{newupdate-installed}}: The update downloaded successfully, you need to manually restart Kubek from the new update file
{{aredelete-fm}}: Are you sure you want to delete
{{new-directory-fm}}: Enter a name for the new directory
{{notempty-fm}}: The directory must be empty for deletion to be possible
{{removing-fm}}: Removing files, do not reload page
{{ns-name-sw}}: Enter the name of the new server
{{forge-autoins-msg-sw}}: If you upload the Forge installation file here, the installation will be done automatically when you create the server
{{papermc-desc-sw}}:

{{spigot-desc-sw}}:
• Based on CraftBukkit

{{enter-new-sn-sw}}: Enter the name of the new server
{{recomm-java-msg-sw}}: Recommended Java version for this server -
{{use-compat-java-auto-sw}}: Use the compatible Java version automatically
{{lookslike-ver-sw}}: It looks like your server version is
{{java-incomp-error}}: Perhaps you have a version of Java that is incompatible with this version of the server, you can change the version of Java in the server settings
{{java-path-error}}: Server startup file possible contains outdated information. Try to go to the server settings and select the appropriate Java version / change the current one
{{jarfile-access-error}}: If the server does not start, the kernel file necessary for starting may not be found. Try to return the missing file or recreate the server on a new one
{{consolemsg-update1h}}: Kubek will check for updates every hour
{{consolemsg-ftpdisabled}}: FTP disabled in config, cancel indiftpd.exe downloading
{{consolemsg-ftpnotsup}}: FTP is not supported on platform
{{consolemsg-restartkubftpd}}: Restart Kubek to download the FTP module (indiftpd.exe)
{{consolemsg-notfound-tr}}: not found. Try to re-create server
{{consolemsg-viewurl-start}}: The web interface is located at
{{consolemsg-cantbestarted}}: Server cannot be started after 3 attempts
{{backups-backupname}}: Enter the name of the backup
{{backups-backupdesc}}: Enter a description for the backup (optional)
{{backups-compress}}: Select backup compression ratio (bigger -> smaller archive, longer operations)
{{backups-restorproc}}: The server backup is being restored, do not reload or close the page and Kubek
{{backup-candestroy}}: Restoring a full backup will delete your server data. When restoring a partial backup, your files may be damaged

{{tgbot-helpmsg}}: Server management /startServer [server name] - Start server /stopServer [server name] - Stop server /restartServer [server name] - Restart server /statuses - Server statuses /help - This message with commands :) /serverLog [server name] - Send latest.log file from server folder Kubek
{{tgbot-cantdo}}: ‚ùó This action cannot be performed now
{{tgbot-sendinglog}}: Please wait, the log file is being sent (latest.log)
{{tgbot-wait2sec}}: ‚ùó Wait 2 seconds before performing an action
{{tgbot-plsstart}}: To start working with the bot, you need to write /start
